rows: Which checking or saving account is considered primary for this debit card.

Current balance of the primary checking/saving bank account. This field originates from the linked bank account record. Updating the balance in the bank account automatically updates it on the card page.
Card currency linked to the associated bank account.
Maximum amount that can be withdrawn daily from ATMs.
Daily maximum amount for POS transactions.
Which transaction channels are permitted for this debit card (e.g., ATM, POS, online transactions).
Whether overdraft protection is enabled on the linked bank account.
html:
Field

Description

Primary checking/saving account

Which checking or saving account is considered primary for this debit card.

Bank account balance

Current balance of the primary checking/saving bank account. This field originates from the linked bank account record. Updating the balance in the bank account automatically updates it on the card page.

Currency

Card currency linked to the associated bank account.

ATM withdrawal limit

Maximum amount that can be withdrawn daily from ATMs.

POS limit

Maximum allowed POS transaction amount.

Daily POS limit

Daily maximum amount for POS transactions.

Transaction channel permissions

Which transaction channels are permitted for this debit card (e.g., ATM, POS, online transactions).

Overdraft protection

Whether overdraft protection is enabled on the linked bank account.
